K10bsu061_u:3636: bodhisattvā asya gambhīrasyānupaliptasya sūtrāntasya yamakavyatyastāhārasya granthaṃ vā paṭalaṃ vā paṭhanti śṛṇavantyadhimucyante deśayanti,
K10bsu061_u:3640: bodhisattvā dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmātmānaṃ vraṇayanti gambhīre ca dharme na nidhyāyanti /
K10bsu061_u:3641: katame dve? aśrutapūrva gambhīraṃ sūtrāntaṃ śrutvā,
K10bsu061_u:3643: sa evamasmābhiraśrutapūrvaḥ kuta āgata iti (pṛcchantastaṃ) tyajanti /
K10bsu061_u:3644: ye kulaputrā gambhīraṃ sūtrāntamudgṛhṇanti gambhīradharmabhājanabhūtāśca gambhīraṃ dharma deśayanti,
K10bsu061_u:3645: tebhyo na sevanti cāsamāgamā na paryupāsate tāṃ ca na satkurvanti /
K10bsu061_u:3647: tābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmādikarmikabodhisattvā ātmānaṃ vraṇayanti gambhīre ca dharme nāvakalpayanti /
K10bsu061_u:3648: “tābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ gambhīrādhimuktika bodhisattvā ātmānaṃ vraṇayanti cānutpattikadharmakṣāntinna labhante /
K10bsu061_u:3649: katame dve? ādikarmikānaciracaritān bodhisattvān avamanyante vimānayanti, na (samā-)
K10bsu061_u:3654: lokasya cāmiṣadānena na tu dharmadānena sattvānupakurvanti /
K10bsu061_u:3655: “maitreya, gambhīradhimuktikabodhisattvā ābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmātmānaṃ vraṇayanti cānutpattikadharmakṣānti śīghranna labhante” /
K10bsu061_u:3657: bhagavantaṃ bodhisattvo maitreya etadavocat- “bhagavatā yathā subhāṣitam,
K10bsu061_u:3670: adhimucyodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti parpavāpsyanti viveśayanti likhiṣyanti parebhyaśca vistareṇa samprakāśayiṣyanti /
K10bsu061_u:3696: teṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānām ā yojanāparisāmantakādrakṣāṃ kariṣyāmo yathā na kaścitteṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmavatāraprekṣyavatāragaveṣyavatāraṃ lapsyate”
K10bsu061_u:3705: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ 'vimalakīrtinirdeśaṃ' vā 'yamakavyatyastābhinirhāraṃ' vāpy 'acintyavimokṣaparivartannāma' dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāraya” /
K10bsu061_u:3707: āttamanā licchavirvimalakīrtirmajuśrīśca kumārabhūtaḥ sa cāyuṣmānānandaste ca bodhisattvāte
K10bsu061_u:3708: ca mahāśrāvakāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣatsadevamānuṣāsura gandharvaśca loko bhagavato
